intro: Trichopyrum intermedium subsp. epiroticum, commonly known as the Epiretic false brome, is a perennial grass species native to the Balkan Peninsula and parts of southern Europe. It typically grows in dry, open habitats such as grasslands, rocky slopes, and forest edges.
